xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/165758-Au cas où je n'aurais pas la palme d'or 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/yRfNONowUlezrl3e2SWsF2wvPHR.jpg Simon, a forty-year-old filmmaker, is more prone to shooting himself in the foot than he is to shooting films. After losing a bet, he shaves off his hair and discovers a strange bump on top of his scull. Believing he's got a terminal illness, he gathers his family, friends and actors at his house in the Lilas neighborhood in Paris to shoot the comedy of his life ! Au cas où je n'aurais pas la palme d'or
